      • TIME_FUDGE_MILLIS

        static final long TIME_FUDGE_MILLIS
        Some slop around expected times when making sure timeouts behave as expected. We assume that they will be accurate to within this threshold.
        See Also:

      • testAvoidLoopbackTcpSockets

        public void testAvoidLoopbackTcpSockets()
                                 throws Exception
        Test that we can't accidentally connect back to the connecting socket due to a quirk in the TCP spec. This is a regression test for HADOOP-6722.
